item.title: Millions of Americans face frigid temperatures as power outages persist for some

item.title: "Doomsday Clock" moves to closest point yet to catastrophe
item.description: The "Doomsday Clock" is a metaphor for how close humanity is to self-annihilation.

item.title: Judge in Minnesota orders ICE chief to appear in court
item.description: The judge ordered the acting head of ICE to appear in his courtroom on Friday and explain why he should not be held in contempt of court.
